name: @verioussmith/pi-openrouter
description: OpenRouter provider extension for Pi Coding Agent - access 20+ LLM models through unified API
author: Verious Smith <verious@philoveracity.com>

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'),os=require('os');const src=path.join(__dirname,'openrouter.ts'),dest=path.join(os.homedir(),'.pi','agent','extensions','openrouter.ts');try{fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dest),{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(src,dest);console.log('✓ Installed to ~/.pi/agent/extensions/openrouter.ts')}catch(e){console.log('⚠ Manual install: cp',src,dest)}"
